subject: Re: Traffic Control for Installs
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you, Detective! Since installs were getting done I figured this was the case, but wanted to be sure.

Regards

	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager

On Thu, May 15, 2025 at 8:04?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	I met with the tech in person Tuesday.  The traffic direction was scheduled and they started this morning at 7am.  I�ve been in communication with them regularly.

	Derek

	Detective D. DeWitt
	Financial Crimes Unit
	Special Weapons and Tactics Team
	Eugene Police Department
	300 County Club Road
	Eugene, OR 97401
	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
	Work Celll � 541-743-6192
________________________________

	From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Sent: Thursday, May 15, 2025 7:58:51 AM
	To: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: Traffic Control for Installs 
	 
	Good morning, 

	Yes, to my knowledge these arrangements have been made.  We will make sure to have traffic control available. 


	
	

	
	

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work

	 

	 

	
	

	
	

________________________________

	From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com >
	Sent: Thursday, May 15, 2025 7:53:02 AM
	To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: Traffic Control for Installs 
	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hi Capt,

	Camera installations are being checked off. Been a few days since we touched base on traffic control so wanted to check in and make sure Derek was able to connect with the tech to arrange it.

	Please let me know if you have any questions.

	Regards
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 


	On Mon, May 12, 2025 at 7:47?AM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
	

		Matt, 

		 

		I got your voice mail about coordinating traffic control for some installs that may occur this week.  I also got your cell number of 949-547-3560.  

		 

		Derek will be back in office this week and can be the point of contact for arranging a marked unit to assist with traffic control.  I was texting with him end of last week.  He anticipates planning to connect with your install techs sometime this week and we briefly talked about the request for assistance for traffic control.  

		 

		On a separate note, I reached out to the ODOT regional manager and waiting for a call back to discuss moving forward on the locations controlled by ODOT.  I will advise once I hear back.  

		 

		Thank you 

		 

		 

		Jake Burke

		Captain � Investigations Division

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road

		Eugene, Oregon 97401

		(541) 682-5895 work
